name: GreenFlame
description:
BlueFlame has brought never-ending Winter to the land. Use your custom GreenFlame and awesome powers to Bring Back Spring!

Jump, use rocket powers, shoot fire and challenge your wits to solve tons of levels in this fun indie plat-former. Unlock new items and customize your character. Avoid dangerous enemies as you solve puzzles to fight Winter & Bring Back Spring. Can you save the realm from never-ending Winter? Play GreenFlame Now!

#GFBBS Green Flame Green Flame Green Flame #GreenFlame
